document.full_text: representative paul d. ryan made it clear on tuesday that he would not run for the senate seat being vacated by herb kohl, a democrat who was first elected in 1988.
document.title: washington: ryan says he will stay in the house
lines_and_colors: representative paul d. ryan made it clear on tuesday that he would not run for the senate seat being vacated by herb kohl, a democrat who was first elected in 1988.
